website_summaries.verdict: A pack of 4, these jute stockings have a burlap flower and a 3-inch ribbon for tying.
pros: Evoking an old-fashioned farmhouse Christmas, these well-made 18-inch stockings (2 taupe and 2 rust red) are double lined and sturdy
Nice as they are, or perfect for adding your own craft touches and personalization
Also available in a 3-pack tasseled design, and there's a matching tree skirt available, too
cons: Trim includes a button, so should be kept away from little ones

customer_reviews.title: Ivenf Christmas Stockings are recommended.
customer_reviews.text: These stocking were received promptly and as described. They are sturdy, look very nice and are a Great addition to our Christmas decor. I would recommend these stockings. Can also be embroidered.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stockings.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stockings and my kids loved them. We shall see how they hold up to Christmas Eve and Christmas morning. They are a great size also.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Rustic and awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the old times stockings your grandma would hang up. This isn’t a bad thing I miss those days and I’m glad my kids get a taste of that.
customer_reviews.author: S.Gates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Project
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for adding additional items to and making them as gifts. Nice quality, well made and arrived quickly. Very affordable and look forward to purchasing future Ivenf items. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stocking!!! They are very high quality and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the set of four burlap stockings, two red and two beige. They came quickly, are of good quality, and are exactly what I was looking for. They are true to the image displayed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made of good quality
customer_reviews.text: These stockings look great! They are made of good quality and the price was great! I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: kim crozier

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised at the quality of the stockings. I got them to send to our out of state kids. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather  R.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Cute, sturdy, and amazing value for cost. Very well made, good size and easily personalized
customer_reviews.author: EKent

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are super cute! Exactly what I wanted and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ehret

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Great value
customer_reviews.text: These we soley bought for decorations for my fireplace. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality and value of the stockings. They matched my burlap Merry Christmas sign fairly well. The red is more of a rust red than a Christmasy red but I still think they look beautiful. I received many compliments on them from all of our visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn618

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect size and the quality was better than I expected!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 of them for outside of my office door. Nice, durable quality. I found nothing wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

product_meta.title: Ivenf Christmas Stockings, 4 Pcs 18 inches Large Burlap Original Handcraft Stockings, for Family Holiday Xmas Party Decorations
feature_bullets: ORIGINAL DESIGN. 4 pack of 2 designs each. Better to match with Ivenf Burlap Plain Christmas Tree Skirt with White Lace.
RUSTIC FEEL. 100% quality jute body & decor, plush fleece cuff. Add a festive feel to your holiday decor. Unique family stockings for christmas.
FINE HANDCRAFT. Original burlap flower with lace decor. Ready to be stuffed with goodies gifts for whole family.
STRONG & DURABLE. Double layer lining design. Thick & sturdy. Last for years to come.
LARGE 18" SIZE. Each christmas stocking has a 3" ribbon hang loop for easy display. 20" diagonal at widest point. Top opening is 7-1/2" wide.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 5.0 out of 5 stars27 ratings5.0 out of 5 stars
